text: "Testify" is a 2000 song by American metal band Rage Against the Machine and is the third single from their third studio album The Battle of Los Angeles. It went to number 186 in Canada and did not chart in other countries including the United States and the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== #"Testify" (Album Version) - 3:31 #"Testify" (Testifly Mix) - 3:50 #"Testify" (Rowena Projects Mix) - 4:23 #"Guerrilla Radio" (Live) - 3:35 #"Freedom" (Live) - 8:3 == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Rage Against the Machine songs
title: Testify (Rage Against the Machine song)
